topic.description: Subject matter or thematic focus of the record (affinity, element, discipline, etc.)

entity_type.description: Identifies the kind of record being described (skill, character, scene segment, lore entry).

function.description: Captures mechanical behavior or role, such as passive effects or mobility tools.

narrative.description: Narrative beats or events that occur inside chapters or scenes.

system.description: Tags that explain rules, provenance, or meta information about the System itself.

skill.description: Applies to definitions or discussions of skills rather than their usage.

scene.description: Used when tagging scene index entries or summaries.

lore.description: Marks records that primarily deliver background lore or world information.

stealth.description: Involves concealment, detection avoidance, or stealth-based tactics.

dark_affinity.description: Pertains to dark affinity revelations, bonuses, or mechanics.

archery.description: Anything related to archery, archers, or ranged combat.

passive.description: Denotes abilities that provide ongoing effects without manual activation.

mobility.description: Marks skills or scenes emphasizing movement, repositioning, or escape tools.

skill_usage.description: A scene or excerpt where a specific skill is put into practice.

training.description: Focuses on practice, drills, or character development sessions.

unlock.description: Represents moments when a new capability, title, or skill becomes available.

level_up.description: Captures explicit level increases or System notifications awarding levels.

skill_lore.description: Explains how skills operate within the System, including flavor text or rules.

mechanic.description: Details a rule, calculation, or persistent mechanic within the System.

tutorial.description: Describes onboarding events, System prompts, or guided walkthroughs.

starter.description: Marks early progression beats such as tutorial rewards or introductory gear.

proficiency.description: Denotes skills or items that confer baseline competence with a weapon or tool.

perception.description: Relates to sensory improvements, awareness, or perception-driven effects.

utility.description: Covers skills or items whose primary role is utility or support rather than damage.

system_event.description: Captures moments driven by the System interface such as notifications or enforced choices.

class_selection.description: Scenes or entries where a class is chosen, offered, or evaluated.

tutorial_setup.description: Scenes covering the start of the tutorial scenario.

office_life.description: Scenes showing Jake's life before the system.

character_intro.description: Introduces characters, their backgrounds, or immediate context before major events.

system_foreshadowing.description: Hints or foreshadowing that the System will soon intervene or become visible.

quiver.description: Relates to quivers or arrow storage devices used for archery.

mana.description: Involves mana usage, storage, or manipulation inside the System.

clothing.description: Apparel-focused items that provide protection or disguise.

weapon.description: General weapon categorization for melee or ranged gear.

storage.description: Items or abilities that expand carrying capacity or organization.

potion.description: Consumables brewed or generated to restore resources or grant effects.

system_initiation.description: Introduction to the System mechanics or awakening.

title_gain.description: Acquisition of a title by a character.

skill_use.description: Character uses a skill in a scene.

combat.description: Direct fights with beasts or humans.

beast_encounter.description: First-time or major encounters with beasts.

first_kill.description: First lethal encounter involving the protagonist.

reflection.description: Scenes where a character reflects on their actions.

instinct.description: References to Jake's instincts or danger sense.

perception_stat.description: Discussions or effects related to perception.

skill_mechanics.description: Explanation or implications of how skills work.

mana_use.description: How mana is used or channeled for skills or gear.

group_dynamics.description: Scenes that highlight team behavior or roles.

injury.description: A character gets injured or has lasting damage.

tutorial_death.description: Mentions or consequences of death within the tutorial.
